name: ALLIANCE OF RAIL NEW ENTRANTS
goal: To represent private passenger rail companies and pursiue the full market opening of rail markets across Europe.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Environment, Regional Policy, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: We follow all rail -related topics. This includes the 4th Rail Package, the revision of rail passenger rights, access to facilities implementing act, all rail corridor initiatives and the work of the European Agency for Railways.
